FAIL_TO_PASS: when negatable boolean flag not specified then value is true
when flag not specified then value is "default"
when option-argument for long optional... is -.1 then consumed=true
when no arguments then listener not called
when program has value/no flag specified with value then specified value
when option-argument for short optional is -1.2e3 then consumed=true
when command-argument is -123.45 then consumed=true
when "short|long" flags defined and short specified then value is true
when option specified on CLI then value returned by getOptionValue
when specify subcommand and option and argument then program.args not empty
when unrecognised argument and known option then asterisk action called
when option defined with --word-word then option property is wordWord
when variadic with long combined argument then not variadic
when required option-argument and default number then value is from args
when option-argument for long optional... is -1.2e3 then consumed=true
when option-argument for short optional... is -1e3 then consumed=true
when option-argument for long optional is -0 then consumed=true
when only long flag defined and not specified then value is undefined
when source from env and implied undefined then implied is implied
when option defined with --Word then option property is Word
